entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILLink CodeFixer tests are failing #88278
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.IO.FileSystem.Tests #88276
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Boolean and String should implement IFormattable #88275
  • OOM on System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteRawLargeJsonToStreamWithoutFlushing #88272
  • Timeout on System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests.WriteEntry_LongFileSize #88271
  • Uri.IsBaseOf(bool) not true by user info #88265
  • Remove EventPipe adapter from NativeAOT implementation #88262
    8.0.0
  • COM source generator Enumerator pattern #88253
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add async parse overloads for `JsonNode` and `JsonElement` #88248
    Future
  • Potential misunderstanding and misuses in Random.GetItems #88247
  • `StreamWriter.DisposeAsync` disposes the underlying `Stream` synchronously #88246
  • [API Proposal]: Implement IAsyncDisposable on `TextReader` #88244
    8.0.0
  • AppSettings.json change detection not working on Azure App Service (Linux) #88240
  • iOS App Terminated on suspending if file stream open #88239
  • [API Proposal]: Allow DoesConsoleSupportAnsi to be overridden on Windows by environment variable #88236
    Future
  • Missing CI test coverage for Vector512 #88233
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/processinfo3/processinfo3/processinfo3.sh #88225
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.EventLogMessagesTests.CanReadAndWriteMessages #88224

Closed

  • Light up `Span` with `Vector512` code paths. #80824
    8.0.0
  • Span indexer doesn't elide bounds check when span initialized from an RVA static #13464
    8.0.0
  • OSX/x64: TargetOS::IsMacOS returns false in jit codebase #87794
    8.0.0
  • Failure running dotnet-pgo during linux-x64 build #88274
  • [Webassembly] dotnet/runtime update broke the aspnetcore build #88250
  • [API Proposal]: Add `IHostedLifecycleService` to support additional callbacks #86511
    8.0.0
  • Enum ToString difference between .NET 6 and .NET 8 #88269
  • [API Proposal]: QuicError.AddressNotAvailable #76435
    8.0.0
  • Treat NFloat as an interop intrinsic type in the interop generators #88229
    8.0.0
  • IHttpClientBuilder should have extension to redact query parameter from logging #68675
    Future
  • Modify HttpClientFactory based HttpClient request logging #44411
    Future
  • Ability to disable default http request logging #85840
    Future
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23316.32] Applications failed with Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #87807
    Future
  • Type.GetProperties does not return non-public properties from inherited type on Android #86149
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add json option to fallback to parsing value from string if type implements `IParsable/ISpanParsable` and enable it by default #88206
  • [API Proposal]: udate QuicError values #87259
    8.0.0
  • Task.Delay(Timeout.Infinite, cancellationToken) does not return when cancellation is requested #88044
  • 'System.TypeLoadException' occurred in Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.dll #88226
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Guid Marshalling Support #87894
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImport with CLong produces SYSLIB1051 and requires disabling runtime marshalling #73975
    8.0.0
  • windows-x86 release MSBuild_CMake is failing #88172
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Tar: Fix PAX regression when handling the size of really long unseekable data streams #88280
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter thread safety infrastructure #88279
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT Watson changes for crashes/unhandled exceptions #88273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump git-commit-info from 2.0.1 to 2.0.2 in /src/mono/wasm/runtime #88270
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, javascript
  • Implement support for `UnsafeAccessor` in the trimmer #88268
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix Out of memory with source gen tests #88266
    area-Extensions-Logging, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [iOS] Add temp cindex attribute to build on xcode 15 #88261
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add C library detection to processinfo3 test #88260
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISCV] Fix .cfi directives for ThePreStub #88259
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NO MERGE] Expriments with QuicStream sending #88256
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Implement JsonTypeInfoResolver.WithAddedModifier #88255
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix OptionsValidator source-gen to skip static and const members #88254
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Implement ICollection<T> on several LINQ iterators #88249
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot] Add Native AOT cross-build support for iOS-like platforms #88242
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make DoesConsoleSupportAnsi respect DOTNET_SYSTEM_CONSOLE_ALLOW_ANSI_COLOR_REDIRECTION #88241
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Unify JIT interface getTypeLayout between VM and crossgen2; refine what is considered "significant padding" #88238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump semver from 7.3.7 to 7.5.3 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #88237
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, javascript
  • Expose stack trace metadata stripping as a supported option #88235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump semver from 7.3.7 to 7.5.3 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/node-webpack #88232
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution, javascript
  • Tar: set directory modification times while extracting. #88231
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Add support to specify substitutions externally #88230
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't set patchpoints in methods with CORINFO_DEBUG_CODE #88227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Clean up Guid.DecodeByte #88267
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix build failures when declaring a COM-style enumerable type #88263
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix missing braces #88264
    bug, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add IHostedLifecycleService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, 8.0.0
  • Delete stale SkipOnTargetFramework attributes (and a few tests) #88251
    needs-area-label
  • Simplify LINQ Shuffler test helper #88252
    area-System.Linq
  • Rename JITAllowOptionalRelocs to JitEnableOptionalRelocs #88243
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove code in nativeaot event trace files under !FEATURE_NATIVEAOT or FEATURE_DTRACE #88258
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration #88211
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add NFloat as an interop intrinsic for the source generator #88257
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Update CompilerPlatformTestingVersion version #88221
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [libs] Fix poll events conversion #86843
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Tweak the register order for xarch to better account for callee saved #88151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #87175
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.8
  • Improve Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection debugging #88082
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: Refactor physical promotion store decomposition slightly #88182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update QuicError #88234
    breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2212435 #88219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't emit nor generate the manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #86850
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [OSX] When HybridGlobalization mode is on load hybrid icu file #88041
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable Aot and Trim analyzers when building runtime tests #88209
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][perf] Simplify the build process for the perf measurements #88201
    area-Infrastructure, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Specially consider CLong, CULong and Guid strictly blittable #88213
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] HttpClientHandler request metrics #87319
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] [jiterp] Use wasm if opcode for null checks and conditional branches #88114
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Array GetArrayDataReference for SZ arrays #87374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Type equivalence support in Crossgen2 #87899
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Pass exact context to getMethodInfo #88025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle primitive-sized remainders overlapping padding in physical promotion #88109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade to LLVM 16 & C++17, and bundle libc++ on Linux #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Apply a number of improvements and bugfixes to JsonNode #88194
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Dedup Task.WhenAll non-generic and generic implementations #88154
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] refactoring wbt a bit #88218
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use wider look-up table while searching chars on Arm64 #88183
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve enum documentation #88191
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Create a doc outlining ownership rules for the ComInterfaceGenerator #88203
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Adjust the costs for floating-point/simd to better reflect reality #87699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Workaround for insufficiently sized destination buffer #88184
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix for 84564 #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • fix TLS resume with HttpClientHandler on Linux #88214
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [CI test] SearchValues<string> #88166
    NO-REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use optimized Index.GetOffset in Range.GetOffsetAndLength #87317
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add clr.tools subset to runtime-community #88160
    area-Infrastructure, arch-s390x
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Flush the gclog after GC #88222
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • ManagedZLib Experiment #2325

Merged

  • Update Arcade #2328

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why does dotnet publish not publish everything in a sln #33742
  • dotnet build is slow for simple projects #33741
    Backlog
  • Cannot Run any commands that build a windows forms project. #33736
  • It should be possible to publish NuGets with ReadyToRun images #33723
  • PublishReadyToRun emits R2R Images of all dependencies too eagerly #33721

Closed

  • Publish of ClickOnce .NET 7 WPF fails #33718
  • SDK causes Segmentation Faults whenever I run essential cli commands. #27174
  • Dependent projects building to same output dir fail to Rebuild #28355
    Discussion
  • Rebuild fails when project with multiple TFMs references Source Code-only Nuget package #28549
    Backlog
  • Roll-forward enabled with `PackAsTool` #33704
  • Unable to disable RS1022 #33696
    .NET 8.0
  • Investigate test instability in SDK CI #33732
  • Ads #33713

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix CmdOption name and aliases #33720
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Fix typo in MSDeploy.cs #24271
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2212742 #33735
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Pass editorconfig files to RazorCoreCompile #33695
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • build fix #33731
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [iOS] Add HybridGlobalization flag in dotnet/sdk #33669
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33671
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix typo in ZipFileCreateFromDirectory.cs #29097
  • Fix typo in TransformWebConfig.cs #27034
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #31581
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Fixed some issues with `details` command #33694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense suggest nuint rather than null #68841

Closed

  • VS maxes out CPU for minutes in projects with lots of types #68842
  • SyntaxFactory.ParseToken parses incorrectly when chained implicitly with linq? #68844
  • Text font in DocumentOutline can't be changed #68809
  • WorkspacePullDiagnosticHandler should handle background analysis scope options for both compiler and analyzer diagnostics #68797
  • unused variables not dimmed inside lambdas/delegates #68839
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33829.535 #68838

PullRequests

Created

  • Update PublishData.json #68847
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove ReturnsVoidIsSetBit flag #68846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix crash in interpolation handling #68845
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8

Merged

  • Mitigate costly syntax tree walks in 'remove unused members'. #68843
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge features/CollectionLiterals into main #68831
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bind to EnvironmentFontFamily in DocumentOutLineWindow. #68811
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • [LSP pull diagnostics] Handle background analysis scope options for both compiler and analyzer diagnostics #68818
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • update System.CommandLine to the latest version #68549
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68837
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve parser error recovery for certain collection-literal cases #68788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Lookahead parsing for collection exprs vs. local functions. #68807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Avoid quadratic lookup of namespace declarations #68832
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Web App template includes icon-192.png file that doesn't appear to be used #49129
  • Unquarantine CompletionProvider tests after Roslyn upgrade #49126
    8.0
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #49125
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #49124
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter, single_query #49123
  • Perf improvement: caching, plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #49122
  • On refresh of blazor webpage it loads forever. #49121
  • AOT build error during publish build in Blazor Wasm #49120
  • Add debugging when running in WSL for Blazor WebAssembly #49119
  • Installation of ASP.NET Core Runtime 6.0.9 Hosting bundle fails when the system is already installed with 6.0.14 #49116
  • [Blazor] Enhanced navigation does not display 4xx errors #49115
  • Hot reload failing on every change #49112
  • Results / TypedResults ignore null values #49107
  • Running fine on RHEL 8 about half an hour then got "The LDAP server is unavailable." exception. #49105
  • Design proposal: solution for cascading values into interactive pages #49104

Closed

  • Quarantine WebAssemblyICUShardingTests #49127
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #49089
  • Hot Reload unavailable #47836
  • Terrible performance from repeated non-incremental calls to static web assets targets #49097
  • Post SendAsync() doesn't return anything (Blazor WASM) #49102
  • Perf regression: json #49090
  • When using signalr in React.js, it does not enter the onclose method and does not working stable #48614

PullRequests

Created

  • Use SearchValues in PathString #49117
    area-runtime
  • Use SearchValues in HostString #49114
    area-runtime
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ec4fed9` to `251e720` #49110
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Add support for antiforgery #49108
    area-blazor
  • Change AddServerSideBlazor to call services.AddRazorComponents().AddServerComponents() #49106
    area-blazor
  • Fix endpoints not being available in debug view until after WebApplication starts #49103
    area-hosting

Merged

  • Update ProjectTemplates to Id Web 2.12.2 + MS Graph v5 support #48863
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7
  • Set Hot Reload controlling headers DOTNET-MODIFIABLE-ASSEMBLIES and A… #48953
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK #49034
    area-infrastructure
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #48414
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Fix F# MVC template #48600
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add public metadata types. #49068
    area-runtime
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • Remove hosted from blazor wasm templates descriptions #48969
    area-mvc, area-blazor
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm
  • Bug hash routing same page with params or query #48994
    area-blazor
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #49022
    area-infrastructure
  • Change the way we detect Node.js in SignalR JS/TS client. #49066
    area-signalr
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure
  • Add WithOrder to IEndpointConventionBuilder #49093
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Backport 48892 to 6.0 #48914
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Backport pr 48892 to 7.0 #48911
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing horizontal scrollbar in `ScrollView` #15953
  • Setting a PublishItemsOutputGroup's PublishProfilePath property leads to empty msi file #15952
  • Visual Studio 17.7.0 Pre2 / Dotnet 8 8.0.100-preview.5.23303.2 / Maui 8.0.0-preview.5.8529 AvoidConstArraysAnalyzer NullReferenceException #15948
  • Visual Studio 17.7.0 Pre2 / Dotnet 8 8.0.100-preview.5.23303.2 / MAUI 8.0.0-preview.5.8529 build error XAGJS7023 for Android #15947
  • The width of the picker cannot be filled on Windows #15941
  • Partial Repost: MainWindow freeze after workaround for "Maui partial UI freeze, typing to fast or method takes time to process." #15939
  • [iOS] Issue when using BindableLayout and Entry/Editor #15937

Closed

  • [Android] Grid with columns is not measured correctly. #15870
    Backlog
  • Errors: WinUI is causing errors.The Android version is not experiencing any issues.The permanent keyboard hiding feature is not working #15708
  • VS 2022 17.6.2 IOS Simulator/Device not displaying correctly #15487
  • Maui Connectivity Change from Online to Offline to Online Connectivity.NetworkAccess == Unknown on Windows 10 #15803
  • Picker selected item text color changes on mouse hover #15804
  • DatePicker Focused color not applied after date selection #15805
  • Blazor Hybrid: When debugging certain events in VisualStudio, e.g. Entry.TextChanged, breakpoints are not being hit and VisualStudio shows an error "No Compatible code running on the thread" #15923
  • Maui - iOS build fails when resizing png file #15751

PullRequests

Created

  • [X] Compiled Bindings to Array #15944
  • [release/8.0.1xxx-preview6] Merge net8.0 to preview6 #15943
  • [net7.0] Grid star expansion fixes #15938
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [ios] fix memory leak in Border #15946
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • [release/7.0.2xx-sr7] [net7.0] Grid star expansion fixes #15942
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 branch #15931
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15936
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #15777
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] bump to xamarin/xamarin-android/main@efa14e26 #15934
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Backport WinUI DeviceTest Fixes #15840
    area/testing

Updated

  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query/Json: implement optimized materializer for JSON queries with parameterless ctor #31166
  • attribute in base class property lost when generating new migrations from inheriting class #31162

Closed

  • Race condition in VB tests #30820
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.34.0 to 3.35.1 #31165
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add `migrations check-pending` Command #31164

Merged

  • Improve expression debugging #31082
  • VB Tests: Use a copy of Northwind #31163

Updated

  • Fix to #31159 - Query/Json: use Utf8JsonReader in materializer #31160
  • Use IDbSetCache.GetSets() when checking for resettable services #31154

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Need offline installer for .NET7+ #16593
  • [NETSDKE2E] On Debian only, SDK dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23310.1-x64.deb installing failed with error: archive 'dotnet-sdk-x64.deb' uses unknown compression for member 'control.tar.zst' ling faile #16646

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16872
  • Test SBRP regen #16869

Merged

  • Revert back to using the 18 image for preview 6 #16878
  • SB smoke tests: test the published output #16858
  • Update SDK diff baselines due to containers change #16870

Updated

  • Include RID in SB artifact file names #16855
    Area-SourceBuild
